Projects

pyRackDS

pyRackDS is a tool to extract data from Racktables and run it through a templating engine.

pyVspDS

pyVspDS is used to create and update Racktables attributes from VMWare vSphere.

pyRackSync

pyRackSync is a synchronization library using the Racktables API

OpenSource Contributions

Racktables

Racktables is a nifty and robust solution for datacenter and server room asset management.

OmniGraffle Stencils

TP-Link Network Equipment

Currently only stencils for TL-SG5412F and TL-SG3424 models. May be expanded in the future as needed.
